Can monsters die? Or do they get forced into being retired (frozen) ?

I've already gotten a warning I should retire my monster but its stats gains only just started to drop when I got that message, and I'd hate to waste the monster training if it dies.

By Thorr on Friday, August 6, 2010 - 11:54 am:
